data.title: Oliver Crane on LinkedIn: Another nice review this week. All my books are a labour of love so nice…
data.meta_description: Another nice review this week. All my books are a labour of love so nice feedback helps to spur me on. If you like crime novels, pop by Amazon and check it…
data.text:
A short survey - I’ve been wondering who’s reading my spy novels (see janmccleery.pixieset.com) and which one they like the best so I’m sending out a short survey. Plus it includes a blatant request for book reviews on amazon - where you go to the book page (go to amazon and search for Jan McCleery and my books come up) give one or more of them 1-5 stars and, hopefully, add a review. Good or bad reviews are fine - it lets amazon and publishers know people are reading the books :-) https://lnkd.in/dmsRRNy9

In this Quarterly Newsletter for Book Lovers, I am sharing my five favorite novels from the last several months and so much more! Books galore! https://buff.ly/3UodwPf #Bookreview #BookBlog

DURING THESE TUFF TIMES, I GIVE AWAY A FREE Book EACH WEEK on Wednesday for 5 days. THIS WEEK'S FREE BOOK is a $7.99 value. A 600-page collection of the best-selling series ... REVIEW: “A RIP ROARING THRILLING ADVENTURE … I love adventure stories, that involve current topics of national interest. I rate this book up there with those written by CLIVE CUSSLER." REVIEW: "Great characters, engaging plot with a smooth flow." REVIEW: "A great read from the first page to the last." https://lnkd.in/eptEP4bg

An Ancient Alien thriller! A discovery in the Bahamas leads to dangerous encounters. Revelations starts the adventure and will leave you wanting more! https://lnkd.in/ehKE7_8 "I couldn't put the book down." Read for FREE with KindleUnlimited. #Books #KindleUnlimited #BooksWorthReading #UFOSightings#mustreadbooks
